definitions.definition: The repetition of the same word or words at the end of successive phrases , clauses or sentences.
An arrangement of chlorophyll grains on the outer surface of plant cells, as opposed to apostrophe (an arrangement at right angles to the surface).

main_definition: ( rhetoric ) The repetition of the same word or words at the end of successive phrases , clauses or sentences.
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) An arrangement of chlorophyll grains on the outer surface of plant cells, as opposed to apostrophe (an arrangement at right angles to the surface).
